name: STEM Excellence Scholarship
description: Annual scholarship for outstanding students pursuing degrees in Science, Technology, Engineering, or Mathematics. Renewable for up to 4 years with maintained academic performance.

name: First Generation College Grant
description: Supporting first-generation college students in pursuing higher education. Includes mentorship program and academic support resources.

name: Women in Technology Award
eligibility: Pursuing computer science or related field
description: Encouraging diversity in technology fields. Recipients also receive mentorship from industry professionals and internship opportunities.

name: Future Nurses Scholarship
description: Supporting the next generation of nursing professionals. Priority given to students planning to work in underserved communities.

name: Community College Transfer Scholarship
eligibility: Community college student transferring to 4-year institution
description: Recognizing academic excellence of community college students transitioning to four-year universities.

name: Creative Arts Fellowship
eligibility: Pursuing degree in visual or performing arts
description: Supporting talented artists in their educational journey. Includes exhibition opportunities and professional development workshops.

name: Hispanic Heritage Scholarship
description: Celebrating Hispanic heritage and supporting educational advancement. Includes networking events and career guidance.

name: Trade Skills Development Grant
eligibility: Enrolled in vocational or trade program
Electrician, plumbing, HVAC, or welding focus
description: Supporting students entering skilled trades. Funds can be used for tuition, tools, and certification exams.

name: Business Leaders of Tomorrow
description: For aspiring business leaders and entrepreneurs. Winners participate in summer accelerator program with industry mentors.

name: Single Parent Education Grant
description: Supporting single parents pursuing higher education. Includes childcare assistance and flexible disbursement schedule.

name: Veterans Education Award
description: Honoring those who served by supporting their educational goals. Can be combined with GI Bill benefits.

name: Environmental Science Scholarship
description: Supporting students dedicated to environmental conservation and sustainability. Includes summer research opportunities.

name: Academic Excellence Award
description: Prestigious scholarship for top academic performers. Renewable for up to 4 years with maintained 3.5 GPA.

name: Rural Community Scholarship
description: Supporting students from rural communities in accessing higher education. Includes transition support and mentorship.

name: Engineering Innovation Grant
description: For creative engineering students with innovative ideas. Winners receive project funding and industry mentorship.
